articles.title: WHO chief says Covid-19 deaths down but warns virus is still on the move | Africanews - Africanews English
articles.description: The World Health Organization said on Wednesday that Covid-19 deaths had dropped by 95 per cent since the start of the year.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization said on Wednesday that Covid-19 deaths had dropped by 95 per cent since the start of the year.
However, it warned that the virus was still on the move and countries wou… [+1110 chars]
